definitions.text: a thin layer covering the surface of a liquid
examples: there was a thin skim of oil on the water

definitions.text: travel on the surface of water
move or pass swiftly and lightly over the surface of

examples: She scanned the newspaper headlines while waiting for the taxi

definitions.text: cause to skip over a surface
examples: Skip a stone across the pond
skim cream from the surface of milk

definitions.text: used of milk and milk products from which the cream has been removed
examples: she can drink skimmed milk but should avoid butter
